findings.title: IP ownership via work product language
findings.rationale: Work product ownership language can effectively transfer IP even if assignment wording is indirect.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY Work product created during employment is owned by Employer, with Employee receiving a royalty-free license for personal portfolio use....
findings.exact_snippet: Work product created during employment is owned by

2. COMPENSATION
Employee's compensation includes a base salary of $125,000 and eligibility for equity grants.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
Work product created during employment is owned by Employer, with Employee receiving a royalty-free license for personal portfolio use.

findings.title: Non-compete / non-solicit style restriction
findings.rationale: Restrictive covenants can limit future business activity; enforceability varies and is commonly negotiated.

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.

8. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
Disputes shall be resolved through good faith negotiation.

9. ATTORNEYS' FEES
Each party is responsible for its own legal expenses.

10. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by Connecticut state law.

This Agreement is effective as of September 1, 2024.

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
